name: Combat Mechanic Conversions
description: Mappings for converting AD&D 2E combat mechanics to PF2E

thac0_conversion.description: Convert THAC0 to PF2E attack bonus
notes: Actual attack bonuses depend on class progression and proficiency

armor_class_conversion.description: Convert descending AC to ascending AC
notes: AD&D uses descending AC (lower is better)
PF2E uses ascending AC (higher is better)

metal_weapons.note: Metal weapons are rare; most are bone, stone, or obsidian
metal_weapons.damage_adjustment: May need adjustment for material strength

psionics.note: Psionic combat uses different mechanics in both systems
